title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view
description: When using the library outline view, it is observed that any item cannot be selected at the first attempt. The focus immediately jumps to the library file node in the outline view.
OB: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view. The focus jumps to the library file node in outline view.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item within the view.
3. Observe that the focus immediately jumps to the library file node instead of selecting the intended item.
